detectors.description:
TheEthereumLottery.Withdraw(uint32) () performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- referral_ledger[owner] += win / 10000 * (100 - referral_fee) ()
detectors.markdown:
[TheEthereumLottery.Withdraw(uint32)]() performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [referral_ledger[owner] += win / 10000 * (100 - referral_fee)]()

detectors.description:
TheEthereumLottery.Withdraw(uint32) () performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- referral_ledger[ledger[DrawIndex].bets[msg.sender].referral] += win / 10000 * referral_fee ()
detectors.markdown:
[TheEthereumLottery.Withdraw(uint32)]() performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	- [referral_ledger[ledger[DrawIndex].bets[msg.sender].referral] += win / 10000 * referral_fee]()

detectors.description:

detectors.description:
TheEthereumLottery.Refund(uint32) () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- now < ledger[DrawIndex].ExpirationTime ()

	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [now < ledger[DrawIndex].ExpirationTime]()

	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Reentrancy in TheEthereumLottery.Withdraw(uint32) ():
	External calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(win) ()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- referral_ledger[owner] += win / 100 ()
	- referral_ledger[ledger[DrawIndex].bets[msg.sender].referral] += win / 10000 * referral_fee ()
	- referral_ledger[owner] += win / 10000 * (100 - referral_fee) ()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- PlayerWon(win) ()
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [TheEthereumLottery.Withdraw(uint32)]():
	External calls:
	- [! msg.sender.send(win)]()
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [referral_ledger[owner] += win / 100]()
	- [referral_ledger[ledger[DrawIndex].bets[msg.sender].referral] += win / 10000 * referral_fee]()
	- [referral_ledger[owner] += win / 10000 * (100 - referral_fee)]()
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- [PlayerWon(win)]()
